gw.plugin.invoice

Interface IInvoiceStream

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IInvoiceStream
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    The IInvoiceStream plugin provides a way to choose the invoice stream for a Charge's invoice items and to customize invoice streams.

    When BillingCenter is selecting an invoice stream for a charge's invoice items, getInvoiceStreamPeriodicityFor is used to choose the periodicity of the stream. Then getExistingInvoiceStreamFor is used to select an invoice stream with that periodicity. If there is no existing invoice stream for the charge (i.e., getExistingInvoiceStreamFor returns null), then a new InvoiceStream will be created and passed to customizeNewInvoiceStream.

    InvoiceStreams are created lazily -- a stream is only created once there is a charge to be invoiced in that stream.

    By default, an Account which is using account-level billing has at most four InvoiceStreams -- one for all charges which have a weekly payment plan, one for all charges which have an everyOtherWeek payment plan, one for all charges which have a twicePerMonth payment plan, and one for all charges which have a payment plan which is monthly or a multiple of monthly (quarterly, everyFourMonths, everySixMonths, everyYear, or everyOtherYear).

    By default, an Account which is using policy-level billing has a separate stream for each policy. If a policy has policy periods with differing periodicities, then there can be more than one stream for the policy. For example, if the Issuance uses a monthly payment plan and its Renewal uses a weekly payment plan, then the policy will need both an InvoiceStream with monthly periodicity and an InvoiceStream with weekly periodicity.

    By default, a Producer has only one InvoiceStream and its periodicity is monthly. All charges for a producer are placed into the single InvoiceStream for that producer.

    • Method Detail

      • getInvoiceStreamPeriodicityFor

        Periodicity getInvoiceStreamPeriodicityFor(InvoicePayer payer,
                                         PaymentPlan paymentPlan,
                                         Periodicity defaultInvoiceStreamPeriodicity)
        Returns the periodicity of the InvoiceStream to use for charges that use the given payment plan and are paid by the given payer.

        Override this method to direct charges which have a given payment plan to an InvoiceStream with a different periodicity than the default. For example, if you have a custom periodicity such as everyFiveMonths, by default it will get its own stream. Override this method if it should be invoiced in a stream with a different periodicity, such as the monthly stream.

        Parameters:
        payer -
        paymentPlan -
        defaultInvoiceStreamPeriodicity -
        Returns:
        the periodicity of the InvoiceStream to use for the given payer and charge

      • getExistingInvoiceStreamFor

        InvoiceStream getExistingInvoiceStreamFor(InvoicePayer payer,
                                        TAccountOwner owner,
                                        Periodicity invoiceStreamPeriodicity,
                                        InvoiceStream defaultExistingInvoiceStream)
        Returns an existing InvoiceStream of the payer to be used for the given charge and invoice stream periodicity. Returns null if there is no existing matching stream. If this method returns null, then a new stream will be created.

        By default, this is the invoice stream of the payer which has the given invoiceStreamPeriodicity. If the charge is a policy-level charge and the account uses policy-level billing, then by default this is the invoice stream of the payer which has the given invoiceStreamPeriodicity and which is for the policy of the given charge.

        Parameters:
        payer -
        owner -
        invoiceStreamPeriodicity -
        defaultExistingInvoiceStream - the existing stream to use for the charge. Null if there is no existing stream that satisfies the default criteria.
        Returns:
        an existing InvoiceStream of the payer that should be used for the given charge and invoice stream periodicity

      • customizeNewInvoiceStream

        void customizeNewInvoiceStream(InvoicePayer payer,
                             TAccountOwner owner,
                             InvoiceStream newInvoiceStream)
        Customizes a newly created InvoiceStream. This method is called if a new stream is created when BillingCenter is selecting an invoice stream for a charge's invoice items.

        Either this method or customizeNewInvoiceStream(InvoicePayer, InvoiceStream) is called when BillingCenter creates a new stream.

        Override this method to set any InvoiceStream extension fields and to change anything about the default initialization of invoice streams.

        If you have streams with custom periodicities, then either override this method to set the stream's overridingAnchorDates or override getAnchorDatesForCustomPeriodicity(InvoicePayer, Periodicity).

        Parameters:
        payer -
        owner -
        newInvoiceStream -

      • customizeNewInvoiceStream

        void customizeNewInvoiceStream(InvoicePayer payer,
                             InvoiceStream newInvoiceStream)
        Customizes a newly created InvoiceStream. This method is called whenever a new stream is explicitly created, such as from the UI.

        Either this method or customizeNewInvoiceStream(InvoicePayer, TAccountOwner, InvoiceStream) is called when BillingCenter creates a new stream.

        Override this method to set any InvoiceStream extension fields and to change anything about the default initialization of invoice streams.

        If you have streams with custom periodicities, then either override this method to set the stream's overridingAnchorDates or override getAnchorDatesForCustomPeriodicity(InvoicePayer, gw.bc.system.typekey.Periodicity).

        Parameters:
        payer -
        newInvoiceStream -

      • getAnchorDatesForCustomPeriodicity

        java.util.List<AnchorDate> getAnchorDatesForCustomPeriodicity(InvoicePayer payer,
                                                            Periodicity customPeriodicity)
        Returns the payer's anchor dates for custom periodicities. Invoice streams that have custom periodicities and no overriding anchor dates call this method whenever they need to compute their anchor dates. This method is only used for custom periodicities.

        If you have streams with custom periodicities, then either override this method or override customizeNewInvoiceStream(InvoicePayer, TAccountOwner, InvoiceStream) to set the overridingAnchorDates for streams with custom periodicities.
        Parameters:
        customPeriodicity - a custom periodicity
